css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-793fc7fe-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,29,48,53),1);padding-top:120px;padding-right:50px;padding-bottom:50px;padding-left:50px;width:calc(33.33% - 1.6667%);flex-basis:calc(33.33% - 1.6667%);min-width:initial;flex-direction:column;}body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-793fc7fe-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,57,79,138),1);display:block;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-793fc7fe-u{padding-top:175px;padding-right:70px;padding-bottom:72px;padding-left:70px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-793fc7fe-u{padding-top:100px;padding-right:30px;padding-bottom:30px;padding-left:30px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-793fc7fe-u{padding-top:80px;padding-right:20px;padding-bottom:20px;padding-left:20px;width:calc(50% - 1.25%);flex-basis:calc(50% - 1.25%);}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-793fc7fe-u{padding-top:50px;width:100%;flex-basis:100%;}}
